meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jaldhar Vyas Nicholas Campiz Dave Leach Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6283.

td.p: Jaldhar Vyas, a software developer and Hindu priest from Jersey City, New Jersey
Nicholas Campiz, a graduate student in geography from Gainesville, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,200)
Dave Leach, a software analyst from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 4-day cash winnings total $60,884)

tr.td: OLD KING COAL
SCRIPT DOCTORS
NAMETH THE BIBLE BOOK
ODDITIES
THE MAIN ALCOHOLIC INGREDIENT
BEASTLY EXPRESSIONS

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Dave
Nicholas
Jaldhar
GREAT ARTS
19th CENTURY CONGRESSMEN
"G-P-S"
(Alex: Those three letters in that order will appear in each correct response.)
ISLANDS IN THE STREAM, SEA OR OCEAN
COLLECTIONS
PULL A MUSCLE
(Alex: A muscle is a word that will appear in the text of each clue. You have to find the muscle.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: The author was blacklisted by the House Un-American Activities Committee because he refused to testify against Communists--fellow Communists at that time.)
...
(Alex: Dalton Trumbo\'s novel was called [*], and it was made into a motion picture also.)
NicholasWhat is All Is Quiet on the Western Fron
$1,000
JaldharWhat is All quiet on the Western front front
$4,400
DaveWhat is All Quiet on the Western Front?
$1,930
Johnny Got His Gun')
